channel.title: How can i change all lvls to 130?
channel.description: I need help change the combat lvl to 165 so i need all my lvls 130 how can i do it

item.title: How can i change all lvls to 130?
item.dc:creator: @Scott1337 Scott1337
item.description:
@Scott1337 wrote:

If your max level is 99, then go into client.java and search for

public int getLevelForXP(int exp) {

&&

Somewhere, a little farther down you should see

return 99;

change the

99;

to

return 130;

Or whatever your max level is, look for it, it will say return ##;

You should also change the

<= 99

to

<= 130

Hope this helped. :D[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 15, 2008, 04:47:24 pm[/size][hr][quote=“TOMSCAPE BETA, post:2, topic:226177”]its easy just do this search in client.java

public int getLevelForXP(int exp) {

public int getLevelForXP(int exp) {
int points = 0;
int output = 0;
if (exp > SERVERMAXXP)
return SERVERMAXLVL;
for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= SERVERMAXLVL; lvl++) {
points += Math.floor((double) lvl + 300.0

  • Math.pow(2.0, (double) lvl / 7.0));
    output = (int) Math.floor(points / 4);
    if (output >= exp) {
    return lvl;
    }
    }
    return 0;

hope this helped[/quote]

You don’t exactly need to change the servers max Exp, just the level because one you hit, I.E 99, it will stop leveling you.

all you need to change is the return ##; and the <= ##

EDIT:

Sorry for the Double Post, didn’t realize it.

Read full topic
item.source: How can i change all lvls to 130?

item.title: How can i change all lvls to 130?
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

its easy just do this search in client.java

public int getLevelForXP(int exp) {

public int getLevelForXP(int exp) {
int points = 0;
int output = 0;
if (exp > SERVERMAXXP)
return SERVERMAXLVL;
for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= SERVERMAXLVL; lvl++) {
points += Math.floor((double) lvl + 300.0

  • Math.pow(2.0, (double) lvl / 7.0));
    output = (int) Math.floor(points / 4);
    if (output >= exp) {
    return lvl;
    }
    }
    return 0;

hope this helped
